body_html:
It seems that chengdianxuezi and pulkitag suffer a somewhat different problem than I did. In my case, Python only crashed when I had imported Gtk before importing tensorflow. I get the impression that the two previous posters suffer from seg faults that doesn't involve Gtk.

I have not been able to test viksit's suggestion since I currently do not have access to a Nvidia graphics card.

body:
It seems that chengdianxuezi and pulkitag suffer a somewhat different problem than I did. In my case, Python only crashed when I had imported Gtk before importing tensorflow. I get the impression that the two previous posters suffer from seg faults that doesn't involve Gtk.

I have not been able to test viksit's suggestion since I currently do not have access to a Nvidia graphics card.
